 running vkuistyles__anim-fade-out; }

@keyframes vkuistyles__anim-fade-in {=20
  0% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
  100% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes vkuistyles__anim-fade-out {=20
  0% { opacity: 1; }
  100% { opacity: 0; }
}

gin: 100% 100%; }
